long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ITC Cloud integration platform providing database driven screen pops.  The ITC Cloud app integrates with back office applications using API’s (Salesforce, ZenDesk, HubSpot, Connectwise, etc) by leveraging API’s the ITC Cloud extension will search any internal database and present the findings in a new window.  The ITC Cloud app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial
